metadata.title: CVE-2022-3620 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Exim and classified as problematic. This issueaffects the function dmarc_dns_lookup of the file dmarc.c of the componentDMARC Handler. The manipulation leads to use after free. The attack may beinitiated remotely. The name of the patch is12fb3842f81bcbd4a4519d5728f2d7e0e3ca1445. It is recommended to apply apatch to fix this issue. The associated identifier of this vulnerability isVDB-211919.

criterions.comment: exim4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
